alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 5:43AM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations around a light glaze. Additional snow accumulations up to an inch along Highway 2 between Hartline and Creston * WHERE...Wenatchee, Cashmere, Entiat, Harrington, Waterville, Number 1 Canyon, Number 2 Canyon, Mansfield, Coulee City, Wilbur, Pangborn Airport, Creston, Badger Mountain Road, Chelan, and Grand Coulee. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roads and slippery walkways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winter weather advisories were removed for Ritzville, Odessa, and Wilson Creek where temperatures have warmed above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
